page.title: 19BILLINGTON TODDLER CLUB
page.content: The recently formed Mother and Toddlers Group is held in the village hall on Wednesday mornings from 10-12. The group was started because there was not sufficient young children for the playgroup to continue, but the village people wanted to keep this option open for the future. The mothers are able to meet, have coffee and chat in a relaxed atmosphere while their children are playing. This appears to be the only place where the young mums are able to meet on a regular basis and they say that it gets themselves and their children out of the house. The children seem to enjoy playing in the large hall where there is a Wendy House, tricycles and many other toys. They also have the security of knowing that their mothers are there if they need them.
